date.description: The date when the data was recorded.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier of the channel associated with the playlist.

playlist_id.description: The unique identifier of the playlist.

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the video within the playlist.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the playlist was watched live or on-demand.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether the viewer has subscribed to the channel or not.

country_code.description: The code representing the country where the playlist was viewed.

device_type.description: The type of device used to access the playlist (e.g., mobile, desktop).

operating_system.description: The operating system of the device used to view the playlist.

views.description: The total number of views the playlist received.

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time of the playlist in minutes.

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average duration of time viewers watched the playlist in seconds.

playlist_starts.description: The number of times the playlist was started by viewers.

playlist_saves_added.description: The number of times the playlist was saved by viewers.

playlist_saves_removed.description: The number of times the playlist was removed from saved lists.
